data.text: @ExC__Gale @crsddn @me_allyann @DanielAndrewsMP I'm still going to wear a mask Sadly I've seen a lot of elderly people not wearing them most likely because of the constant blurb that it's the vaccination jabs that stop covid pushed by Morrison & MSM Masks are important but many don't wear them correctly
@crsddn @CdrHBiscuitIII I bet you do David. My background is in organisational and social research so I get what you are doing. Cheers - Steve

@OZloop @CdrHBiscuitIII No problem Steve. Thankyou. 

Yes, we have all seen plenty of experts (?) on the topic, and we have our own personal views and networks, but sometimes a reliable unbiased cross-section of responses from the public is what is really needed to allow constructive debate.

@crsddn @me_allyann Sorry @DanielAndrewsMP , ending the mask mandate won't earn you votes. Unless you believe that business owners' votes are worth more than those of ordinary citizens. Also, this is not NSW so I'm not sure why you're dancing to the tune that Perrotet is playing.

@crsddn @CdrHBiscuitIII Thanks David. Should have put my glasses on.

Great work by the way. Raises interesting questions.
@crsddn @ByrnePip Yes such a small cost for such a huge benefit. I will continue too so others that do don't think they are alone.
@kazza264 @ByrnePip Yes, we are seeing similar responses from our community. Good to see.
@crsddn @ByrnePip Went to the bakery this morning and most had masks on. People do not want the virus.
@OZloop @CdrHBiscuitIII Is on bottom of snapshot. n = 550.
